backend/AltSignup.mo: Provides a simple signup handler that validates non-empty credentials and returns a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Implements reward tracking, inventory calculation, and user-authorization logic for a chocolate-themed reward system.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for various frontend source files used elsewhere in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, configures the Internet Identity URL, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Declares alternative origins allowed for Internet Identity derivation.
frontend/public/404.html: Redirects unknown routes to index.html so the SPA router can handle them.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with the root layout and all application routes.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity client and login configuration including provider URL and derivation origin.
frontend/src/components/AccountActionsMe: Renders a hamburger menu with Logout and Delete Account actions, handling disabled and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Shows detailed Internet Identity auth diagnostics including status, timing, platform info, and stall detection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Displays a user-friendly auth error with optional retry and return-to-landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Explains popup-blocking issues during Internet Identity login and provides retry and direct II link options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Shows real-time auth flow progress, outcomes, timing, and suggested actions with retry and II link support.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Displays backend warmup states with loading, success, or failure messaging and optional retry.
frontend/src/components/auth/DisplayName: Modal dialog prompting the user to set a display name with validation and skip/save options.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityCon: Renders a card showing a principal's display name and ID with actions to continue or switch identities. Supports loading state and principal truncation.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handles Internet Identity authorize callbacks by checking session flags, loading the user profile, and routing users to onboarding or post-login pages. Runs automatically when the auth callback is detected.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Loads II configuration asynchronously and wraps children in an InternetIdentityProvider with safe createOptions. Renders nothing until config is ready.
frontend/src/components/auth/PostAuthDis: Prompts new authenticated users to set or skip a display name based on session flags and stored names. Navigates to onboarding after save or skip.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedHea: Header component that displays title/subtitle and manages logout and delete-account flows using AccountActionsMenu.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with onboarding and auth handlers and renders the router outlet.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Provides a task-focused modal with a configurable countdown timer and completion controls.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config stub returning disabled settings and warning to use the proxy client instead.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Stores, hydrates, and persists onboarding results in localStorage with a context provider. Exposes methods to set and clear the stored result.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Tracks user‑initiated auth attempts with timestamps, correlation IDs, and session flags. Provides helpers to start, end, reset, and inspect an auth attempt.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Manages detailed auth-flow state, timing, step transitions, and slow-step detection for diagnostics. Provides functions to start attempts and record step transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPageAutoredire: Automatically redirects authenticated users away from login/signup based on profile and Sweet Summit state.
Provides a stabilized auth signal by waiting for identity initialization and a short delay to avoid transient redirects.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Manages canister warmup by pinging the actor with timeout, tracking state, and offering retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity initialization, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty placeholder file for Internet Identity signup testing.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalDisplayName.t: Manages per-principal display names and skip flags in localStorage with getters, setters, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Mobile-safe II login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and returns detailed structured login results.
Mobile-safe II login hook using shared configuration for consistent setup and structured outcome reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Provides password-based identity context with storage-backed login, logout, and automatic restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Hook that tracks timeouts for post-auth phases, reporting elapsed time and timeout status with reset support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting the caller’s user profile using react-query and an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewards.ts: React-query hooks to fetch caller reward inventory and add rewards, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps by timing phases and reporting stall state, reasons, and elapsed time.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a chocolate‑themed color system for the app UI.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client stub that throws an error and should not be used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Client for calling external AI proxy endpoints with validation, typed requests, and structured error handling.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage key and safe JSON helpers for persisting onboarding results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity context, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily tasks page that loads AI-generated tasks, displays them with a modal, and awards rewards on completion.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Displays user chocolate rewards filtered by time range, handles loading and error states, and shows counts for different reward types.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with app intro, feature carousel, and navigation to signup or login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements complex Internet Identity login flow with validation, diagnostics, mobile handling, and redirects based on profile state.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Guides new authenticated users through a multi-step onboarding flow, saving profile data and redirecting based on prior completion.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Handles Internet Identity signup with validation, stalled login detection, diagnostics, and redirects depending on existing user profile.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Simple backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding on success.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: React page showing a three‑slide onboarding summary and redirecting users to Weekly Mountain after marking Sweet Summit as seen.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Loads or generates the weekly mountain plan using onboarding data, caching results per week and handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides structured logging, timing, and correlation utilities for tracking authentication steps and outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities and delegations to determine if a session is usable or stale.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and manages storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for mobile‑specific behavior.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts unknown AI values into renderable strings and offers validation and fallback helpers.
frontend/src/utils/sessionFlags.ts: Manages session‑scoped flags for tracking new‑account flows via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/sessionReset.ts: Clears all locally stored SweetSteps state including onboarding and weekly mountain caches.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Parses URL parameters, persists them in sessionStorage, and manages cleanup of parameters from URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing UI/UX layout fixes and a header hamburger-menu redesign, including existing and pending feature requests.
